long.en:
ğŸ”¥ The Yaniyo.com Chrome Extension enhances your shopping experience on Amazon.com.tr by automatically adding the price history of the products you browse.

âœ¨ What Does It Do?
âœ… Shows the real-time price history of products.
âœ… Presents price changes graphically.
âœ… Ensures you don't miss the best shopping opportunities.
âœ… Displays alternative products.

ğŸ”’ The Yaniyo.com Chrome Extension values user privacy. The extension does not collect or store your personal data. You can use it securely without any information being collected about you.
